text: Tell me if this feels familiar:
you have apps, data and APIs everywhere
and you need them all to work together.
So, let us help with that.
you can connect all of this
and you can do it without a single line of code.

And that means that the next time you’re
holding an event,
you can build a flow so that each registration in Eventbrite
immediately triggers a message to Gmail, Slack, and Salesforce
And you can use that same flow
every time you have an event.
So, instead of looking like this …
So, really, your sanity depends on IBM App Connect.
